About Us

Welcome to Sweet-Pixel Beauty Parlour

We offer a full range of Hair and Beauty treatments by using best products with our expertise knowledge over 10 years. Our contemporary bridal dressing will enhance your natural beauty to bring out the best in you. Look glamorous on your wedding day and reveal your true beauty. Our qualified & experienced dedicated staff is committed to provide a high quality service. Visit Queens Salon to direct yourself into the path of beauty. We offer,

Hair Care.
